biotools.summary: yanocomp does detection of RNA modifications from nanopore direct RNA sequencing (DRS) data which has been "eventaligned" using nanopolish. It uses a comparative approach with General mixture models similar to those used by nanocompore and xpore.

bioschemas.name: Yanocomp
